channel.title: Comments on: 4 Years Of Working Out
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: So after good sex your knees hurt, you're covered in sweat and in urgent need of a shower? Hmmmm.... interesting
item.content:encoded: So after good sex your knees hurt, you’re covered in sweat and in urgent need of a shower? Hmmmm…. interesting

item.title: By: hsaldon
item.dc:creator: hsaldon
item.description: I heard somewhere that good sex is like running for an hour. but I don't want to downgrade this blog so I will keep the conclusions to myself :)
item.content:encoded: I heard somewhere that good sex is like running for an hour. but I don’t want to downgrade this blog so I will keep the conclusions to myself :)

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... good one. Well, my sabich consumption is much lower these days than before. Practically zero over the past month and a half.
item.content:encoded: Hehe… good one. Well, my sabich consumption is much lower these days than before. Practically zero over the past month and a half.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: I read somewhere that the best way to take care of extra fat around the stomach is to change the ratio between aerobics and sabich ;)
item.content:encoded: I read somewhere that the best way to take care of extra fat around the stomach is to change the ratio between aerobics and sabich ;)
